description: The headquarters of the Marines, site of the recent Summit War. After the war, it remains the location where aftermath events unfold, including the attack on Gecko Moria.

keyEvents.title: Impel Down Level 6 Breakout Revealed at Marineford
keyEvents.description: Sengoku learns about the catastrophic Impel Down breakout and the World Government's cover-up order while at Marineford.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the aftermath of the war and the continuing consequences at Marine Headquarters.

keyEvents.title: Doflamingo Attacks Moria in Marineford Backstreets
keyEvents.description: In the backstreets of Marineford, Gecko Moria is attacked by Pacifistas under Doflamingo's command.
keyEvents.significance: Reveals the dark operations happening even at Marine Headquarters.

statusHistory.reason: Heavily damaged from the Summit War, eventually relocated

description: Trafalgar Law's submarine, where Luffy is being treated after the Summit War. The Heart Pirates' vessel serves as a safe haven from pursuing Marines.

keyEvents.title: Hancock Reaches Law's Submarine
keyEvents.description: Boa Hancock tracks down and lands on the Polar Tang to check on Luffy's condition.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the submarine as Luffy's current location and refuge.

keyEvents.title: Jinbe Emerges from Submarine
keyEvents.description: Jinbe comes out from the submarine to express his guilt and shame over failing to protect his comrades.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes the submarine as the location where both Luffy and Jinbe are recovering.

statusHistory.reason: Serving as the Heart Pirates' main vessel

description: The world's greatest prison, now in catastrophic condition after Blackbeard's raid and mass Level 6 prisoner escape. Magellan is severely injured and many dangerous criminals are now loose.

keyEvents.title: Impel Down Level 6 Breakout Revealed
keyEvents.description: The full extent of the Impel Down breakout is revealed, with many Level 6 prisoners escaped and Magellan severely injured.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the catastrophic consequences of Blackbeard's infiltration and the World Government's cover-up.

keyEvents.title: Blackbeard's Level 6 Recruitment Revealed
keyEvents.description: Blackbeard's brutal death match recruitment process in Level 6 is revealed, showing how he selected his new crew members.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes Impel Down as the source of the world's newest major threats.

statusHistory.reason: Functioning as the world's greatest prison
Catastrophically damaged from Blackbeard's raid and mass prisoner escape
